Articles.Content:
I have no idea why but I was watching Reusable Space Program ep 21 and saw the "Mun Train". I adapted this into some kind of train on Kerbin.

Anyway, craft files available here. Note: it is very laggy, possibly due to the crazy number of parts. On my system, I was getting ~ 5-10 fps at the best (although it is an Athlon 860k with an R7 260x).

Also a time lapse of it's creation because why not?
